skill.name: frontend-design
skill.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill when the user asks to build web components, pages, or applications. Generates creative, polished code that avoids generic AI aesthetics.
skill.summary: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill wh...
skill.author: anthropics

security_audit.summary: Official skill from Anthropic's approved repository. Contains only documentation files with design guidelines. No executable code or security risks detected.

content.value_statement: Your interface looks generic and lacks visual direction. This skill creates distinctive frontend designs with bold typography, unique layouts, and memorable aesthetics.
actual_capabilities: Defines clear aesthetic direction before building interfaces
Specifies distinctive typography and font pairings
Creates cohesive color themes using CSS variables
Designs layouts with asymmetry and spatial innovation
Adds purposeful motion with staged animations
limitations: Does not execute or preview code in browser
Requires clear requirements for brand alignment
Cannot access external fonts or assets

use_cases.title: Pitch-ready landing page
use_cases.description: Create a bold landing page concept that stands out in stakeholder reviews with distinctive visual direction.

use_cases.title: Distinctive component set
use_cases.description: Generate cohesive UI sections with unique layouts, typography, and motion that avoid generic patterns.

use_cases.title: Brand-first website
use_cases.description: Transform brand vision into striking, production-grade web interfaces with memorable aesthetics.

prompt_templates.title: Starter landing page
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a one-page launch site for a new fitness app. Use a bold aesthetic and provide HTML and CSS.

prompt_templates.title: Feature section upgrade
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a standout features section for a SaaS dashboard. Use strong typography, custom colors, and subtle motion.

prompt_templates.title: Editorial homepage
prompt_templates.prompt: Build an editorial homepage for a design magazine. Use asymmetry, layered imagery, and refined typography.

prompt_templates.title: Advanced branded system
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a multi-section website with a brutalist theme. Include layout, typography, color system, and animation guidance.

output_examples.input: Design a bold landing page for a music festival with a retro futurist theme.
output: Large display title with neon glow and tight tracking
Split hero layout with angled poster panel and ticket call to action
High contrast palette with dark base and electric accent
Staggered reveal for hero text and lineup cards

best_practices: Describe the audience, tone, and brand references clearly
State technical constraints like framework or CSS approach
Request specific motion effects and layout experimentation
anti_patterns: Requesting generic or default system font designs
Omitting context about the product or target users
Asking for backend features or database logic

faq.question: Is this compatible with my framework?
faq.answer: Yes. Specify React, Vue, or plain HTML and the output will align to that choice.

faq.question: What are the limits of the designs?
faq.answer: The skill creates frontend code and guidance, but it does not run or test the output.

faq.question: Can I integrate this with my design system?
faq.answer: Yes. Provide tokens or rules and it will adapt typography, color, and spacing.

faq.question: Is my data stored or shared?
faq.answer: No. Provide only the content you want in the UI output.

faq.question: What if the output looks off?
faq.answer: Share more constraints or request a different aesthetic direction for refinement.

faq.question: How does this compare to generic UI helpers?
faq.answer: It prioritizes bold aesthetics and distinctive layouts instead of generic templates.
